column1:
<?xml version=""1.0"" encoding=""utf-8""?>
    <configuration>
      <system.webServer>
        <handlers>
          <add name=""httpPlatformHandler"" 
               path=""*"" verb=""*"" 
               modules=""httpPlatformHandler"" 
               resourceType=""Unspecified""/>
        </handlers>
        <httpPlatform 
             processPath=""%DNX_PATH%"" 
             arguments=""%DNX_ARGS%"" 
             stdoutLogEnabled=""false"" 
             startupTimeLimit=""3600""/>
      </system.webServer>
    </configuration>
